item.title: Berenson Acquisition Corp I S-1
item.description: Berenson Acquisition Corp I, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC S-1 filing on September 10, 2021 had 75847 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1708 instances combination - 1310 instances shares - 1119 instances initial - 1100 instances stock - 936 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
